configuration.title: Explore the Map
configuration.stem: How do these behaviors affect the temperature control of the animal? Sort the behaviors to the correct box to show if it helps the animal warm up or cool down.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: Think about which actions will raise and lower an animals body temperature.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: Moving into the sun, shivering, and going underground will all raise an animalâ€™s body temperature. Moving into the shade, panting, and sweating will all lower their body temperature.

configuration.imageAlt: This illustration shows a dog, a lizard, and a bird. Ask your teacher to describe the diagrams to you.
